# init()

**Initializer**

Initializes a new world-tracking configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

To use the configuration in an AR experience, pass it as an argument to your app’s [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSession/run(_:options:)] function.

## Creating a Configuration

- **initialWorldMap**: The state from a previous AR session to attempt to resume with this session configuration.

items.description: The state from a previous AR session to attempt to resume with this session configuration.
